name: On a Knight's Edge
description:
Well done heroes! The villain is slain and your backpack is full of loot. But the adventure is not yet done! Now, you must buckle up and make your way back to town safely! Be wary: the way home isn’t safe for just one hero. You’ll have to work together to navigate this perilous passage! Cooperate with your comrade and make your way back up through the ravine via a series of devious puzzles, all the while racing against a rising tide of certain death! Keep your wits about you, heroes. Your survival is balanced…On a knight’s edge!

CONTROLS (Player 1 / Player 2)

  • MOVEMENT - WASD / Left Controller Stick
  • JUMP - Spacebar / Any Controller Button
  • Escape - Return to the main menu

THEME

Remember heroes, that strength comes from unity! A single hero alone cannot traverse this dungeon, no matter how fast they may be. You must rely on your partner to unlock the way forward, and trust that once your partner makes it through that they’ll help you in turn. Communication and coordination are key to making it through this game. Unity in this adventure isn’t just empowering, nor is it merely an engine; it’s a tool necessary for survival!
